text:
De @VVD wil belastinggeld terug van #Oxfam dat niet is besteed aan hulp voor Haïti.
Kan de #VVD dan ook het salaris terughalen van alle VVD'ers die door fraude, malversaties en onkunde zijn afgetreden ?
Tomorrow's front page: Top Oxfam staff paid Haiti survivors for sex #tomorrowspaperstoday https://t.co/xMiQPh0JIn
Oxfam & the like NGOs will do everything to impede & stop India's rise & Modi detractors will use them as pincers against India https://t.co/fLUWhkDLqI
Why NGOs like @Oxfam, @amnesty, @christian_aid & others need to clean up their act. My column https://t.co/3sJmlXW4eS

RT How is it @skynews @BBCNews air #oxfam sex abuse allegations 24/7, but this Huge Public Interest Story re Historic Westminster #ChildAbuse inquiry is given NO AIR TIME #marr #peston #bbcsp #paterson @bbc5live #skypapers #r4today @LBC #ALLOUTPOLITICS  https://t.co/dvvrZFQmWl

The Oxfam scandal that has UK govt delinking from the Org is not unique. Foreign govts use these NGOs for their agendas - Save the Children another example as we know in Pak. That is why INGOs & foreign funding of Pak NGOs must be transparent & subject to strict accountability.
Top #Oxfam staff paid Haiti survivors for sex. #tomorrowspaperstoday https://t.co/lwgk2BKGyH
Will Winnie Byanyima survive Oxfam sex scandal? Find the analysis in Saturday Vision. #EPAPER via - https://t.co/DpUmB9m9Jc https://t.co/5SYvCzab7I

Haitian writer Edwidge Danticat on Oxfam's sexual abuse scandal: "Maybe this is a #MeToo moment… for aid workers who do this kind of thing, not just in Haiti, but all over the vulnerable world" https://t.co/QXhATPgyeC

Imagine the poor Oxfam press officer being told about the story.
"Senior staff were fired for paying for sex."
"OK - that's bad but I'll work up a line"
"They were earthquake survivors."
"Ah. Right. That's really bad."
"Oh and some of them may have been underage."
*Resigns*
.@swapan55's column | Oxfam scandal reveals dark side of do-gooder NGOs https://t.co/ldjV0fVDo6 via @TOIOpinion https://t.co/w8G2v7A9n2

Establishment media pundits feign shock about the #OxfamScandal, as if we haven't been seeing this type of abuse for decades. Charities must have increased transparency and accountability immediately. Otherwise these abuses will repeat indefinitely.

https://t.co/4hVQkAXDeb https://t.co/WdK1W1WzEy

Haiti Suspends Oxfam over Sex Crimes and Cover-Up #oxfamscandal https://t.co/hIZLUDNspN

Mr Van Hauwermeiren “admitted using prostitutes at the villa rented for him by Oxfam with charitable funds.”

The charity “acknowledged that staff in Haiti had felt intimidated and unable to raise the alarm.”

Explosive exclusive via @thetimes 

https://t.co/jiTUCBmel2

Reporter @TimesONeill helped break the story on Oxfam's sex abuse and cover-up in Haiti: "There were a range of offenses, but the common thread running through all of them was some pretty nasty sexual exploitation of local women who were in desperate need" https://t.co/hZCQLMwkLn
